tutorials.title: Timeline Fundamentals
tutorials.description: Master keyframe animation in the Timeline panel. Learn to animate character movements, expressions, and transitions.
tutorials.author: NovelMind Team

steps.title: The Timeline Panel
steps.content: The Timeline allows you to create frame-by-frame animations. You can animate position, scale, rotation, opacity, and more.

steps.title: Animation Tracks
steps.content: Each property you animate gets its own track. Common tracks include Position, Rotation, Scale, and Alpha.

steps.title: Adding Keyframes
steps.content: Double-click on a track at the desired time to add a keyframe. The keyframe stores the property value at that moment.

steps.title: Playhead Scrubbing
steps.content: Drag the playhead to preview your animation at any point. The Scene View updates in real-time.

steps.title: Easing Curves
steps.content: Select a keyframe and open the Curve Editor to adjust how the animation accelerates and decelerates.

steps.title: Preview Animation
steps.content: Click Play in the timeline controls to preview your animation. Use the loop button for continuous playback.

hints.content: Select an object in the Scene View to see its animation tracks.
